body_html:
@tedyu @mysticaltech

I installed it with the following command.

sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7_7.0.5.15-1+cuda9.0_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7-dev_7.0.5.15-1+cuda9.0_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7-doc_7.0.5.15-1+cuda9.0_amd64.deb

I found libcudnn.so.7 in /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu. Do you know why it will be installed there?

╭─keiichi.kuroyanagi@instance-1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
╰─$ pwd                                                                                                                                                              02:32:15
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
╭─keiichi.kuroyanagi@instance-1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
╰─$ ls libcudnn.so.7                                                                                                                                                 02:32:26
libcudnn.so.7@

body:
@tedyu @mysticaltech 

I installed it with the following command.
```
sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7_7.0.5.15-1+cuda9.0_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7-dev_7.0.5.15-1+cuda9.0_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcudnn7-doc_7.0.5.15-1+cuda9.0_amd64.deb
```
I found libcudnn.so.7 in `/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu`. Do you know why it will be installed there? 
```
╭─keiichi.kuroyanagi@instance-1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
╰─$ pwd                                                                                                                                                              02:32:15
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
╭─keiichi.kuroyanagi@instance-1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
╰─$ ls libcudnn.so.7                                                                                                                                                 02:32:26
libcudnn.so.7@
```
